title: Sydneyâ€™s Best-Kept Secret: Hawkesbury Waterfront Stay with Gourmet Dining
description: Uncover an ultra-exclusive private escape at Peats Bite, on the picturesque Hawkesbury River. Accessible only by boat or seaplane, feel worlds away from the city despite only being a 90-minute journey from Sydney. Arrive in VIP style with return boat transfers included and enjoy gourmet inclusions of daily breakfast, one three-course lunch with a bottle of wine to share for two and a tapas dinner for two.
